CSS_media.summary: The _media CSS at-rule can be used to apply part of a style sheet based on the result of one or more media queries. With it, you specify a media query and a block of CSS to apply to the document if and only if the media query matches the device on which the content is being used.

blockquote.para: Note: In JavaScript, the rules created using _media can be accessed with the CSS object model interface.
